item.title: Pot hole on Lobleys Bridge Abbeymead, 10th December
item.description:
Pot hole in the middle of the bridge spanning the M5. This is a deep pot hole. I witnessed first hand your workers assess this at around 14::00 after they had temp filled in another shallower pot hole nearer to Coopers Edge. For public safety fix this pot hole before it causes damage to a vehicle and a potential accident. Any issues please call me on 07979844437 If you are not going to repair it please call me explaining why.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A tree located on the pavement between 10 and 12 Argyll Road was felled on 17 October 2024. The barriers that were put up around the tree stump remain in place and they are partially obstructing the pavement., 10th December
item.description:
Pavement between 10 and 12 Argyll Road - barriers put up following felling of tree.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Argyll Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 10th December
item.description:
Customer reported that drain outside 57 Humber Rd has been blocked for 3 months & is impacting on no.53. Customer's son has made attempts to clear drain.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two to three pot holes in quick sucession.Poor infill during repairs previuosl;y carried out are just removed by heavy rainfall. Therefore we have pot holes, debris and a rough patch of road fopr about 3 metres, 10th December
